name: Becca Cosmetics Gradient Sunlit Bronzer, Sunrise Waves
desciption: Becca Gradient Sunlit Bronzer is best for medium-to-deep skin tones. An illuminating bronzer that combines Sunlit Bronzer with a highlighter for a naturally radiant glow. Swirl, glow and go for shimmering multi-tonal bronze or use each shade individually for customized endless-summer effects. Layer until you achieve the bronze you want. The glow-giving formula won't cake or look dry, thanks to a liquid that is blended and pressed into the powder for a creamy finish and silky feel. Available in Sunrise Waves shade.
features:

name: Becca X Chrissy Teigen Glow Face Palette
desciption: We’ve long coveted Chrissy’s cool-girl, California radiance, and now—thanks to this amazing BECCA x CHRISSY TEIGEN collab—we, too, can glow to Teigen-level heights. Whipped up with the model, mom, cookbook author herself, this limited-edition palette features three NEW, exclusive formulas, along with one of Chrissy’s all-time favorites: the Shimmering Skin Perfector Pressed Highlighter in Rose Gold. Each warm, summer-ready shade is super-blendable, flattering on all skin tones, and evokes the kind of radiance BECCA believes in—effortless, natural, and authentic. Use each part of the palette on its own, or mix them together for an all-over, lit-from-within look.
features:
-	Delivers an iridescent sheen to cheekbones, brow bone, and nose.
-	Luminous Blush in Hibiscus Bloom. The creamy formula is perfect to wear alone, or mix with your favorite highlighter
-	Sunlit Bronzer in Malibu Soleil. Provides Chrissy Teigen's coveted, Cali-babe bronze.
-	The silky, buttery formulas glide effortlessly across your cheekbones, leaving you with a dewy, lit-from-within glow

On one end, a doe foot applicator applies a long-wear pigmented primer that preps lids with rich colour and a satin finish. Wear separately or layer for a crease-proof, colour-shifting chrome effect that lasts all day.

name: Becca Shimmering Skin Perfector Pressed Highlighter - Champagne Pop, 8 g
desciption: What it does: Find refined luminosity in any light—this formula features ultrafine luminescent pearls that absorb, reflect, and refract light so your natural radiance is never lost. Unlike the traditional pressed powder method which simply mixes and compresses dry ingredients, this unique process blends pigments with proprietary liquid binders, resulting in unparalleled, creamy application with balanced color dispersion. Like a compact full of crushed gemstones, the multi-toned, ultra-fine pigment pearls adjust to skin’s natural undertones for a truly unique glow. What it is formulated WITHOUT: - Parabens What else you need to know: For fuller-looking lips, follow lip gloss or lipstick with a dab of Shimmering Skin Perfector to the center of your lower lip. Perfection is yours to define. Polished or undone. Soft or sultry. Whatever you want to achieve, perfected skin is the essential starting point. Through premium formulas and expert tips, BECCA can help you attain a natural, effortless complexion that elevates your every look. BECCA presents a highly curated selection of cosmetics that further reveal your natural beauty rather than covering it up. By matching your skin tone, you can create perfect looking skin while highlighting your favorite features and amplifying the look with a dramatic eye or bright lip when the mood strikes. Lightweight, luxurious and advanced, BECCA makes your entire beauty routine a more enjoyable experience while still performing all day.
features:
-	A creamy powder luminizer that absorbs and reflects light for a superb natural glow
-	Color: Champagne Pop - soft white gold w/ pinky peach undertones
